quote: 10 of [#31Reasons4TaxReform](https://twitter.com/hashtag/31Reasons4TaxReform?src=hash): America can't compete for business and jobs when we have the world's highest corporate tax rate.
quotePlain: 10 of #31Reasons4TaxReform: America can’t compete for business and jobs when we have the world’s highest corporate tax rate.
name: Kristi Noem

claims.title: the US has the highest corporate tax rate in the world
claims.negative: the US doesn't have the highest corporate tax rate in the world
claims.negativePlain: the US doesn’t have the highest corporate tax rate in the world
claims.truth: The US does have a high *statutory* rate (up to 35%), but significant deductions and exemptions mean companies actually end up paying a much lower rate; the *effective* tax rate is about average. Furthermore, while the statutory rate relatively high, it is not the highest in the world; that distinction goes to the United Arab Emirates with rates up to 55%.
claims.truthPlain: The US does have a high statutory rate (up to 35%), but significant deductions and exemptions mean companies actually end up paying a much lower rate; the effective tax rate is about average. Furthermore, while the statutory rate relatively high, it is not the highest in the world; that distinction goes to the United Arab Emirates with rates up to 55%.
